Subject: Requirement of Quotation for Christmas decoration material

Dear Vishal,

As discussed please send Quotation of following :

1.Chritmas tree-1 big and 1 small
2.Chritmas dress(on 1 day Rent basis) - 01 qty
3.Decoration material-e.g. : stars, small boll, small size bell
4.Chocklate pack - 5 packs
5.Cotton: 2 qty.
